website_summaries.verdict: While these red candles look like they were made to complement your holiday décor, they burn cleanly and will light your space as needed.
pros: Up to 9 hours of burn time per candle

customer_reviews.title: Shape, good;  color, disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I haven't burned these yet. I hope they burn slowly snd evenly. I ordered the cranberry candles, and they seem closer to Christmas red to me. I will keep them, but I am disappointed in the color. I wanted the small diameter pillar candles and they are that; they are labeled as tapers, but I could tell the shape from the pictures. In that way I am pleased. Most candles of this type are nowadays called tapers, but tapers are TAPERED! Pillars have straight sides, not getting smaller toward the tops. Pillars=straight tapers=tapered/slanted ;
customer_reviews.author: Caro

customer_reviews.title: Favorite can
customer_reviews.text: I have used Colonial candles for many years, they have been consistently long burning with deep color. Very happy. I would love the option of a variety of colors or buying two instead of 6.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality at great value!
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly! Great deal for these candles which are sold at our local hardware store for a higher price.
customer_reviews.author: Christin S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because of the slow burn. I like the color of the candles and the quality of the candles.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: was not happy.
customer_reviews.text: Half of the order was broken in the box, was not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce A. Thornton

customer_reviews.title: none were broken
customer_reviews.text: they look nice and deep red, just right for the Christmas table.
customer_reviews.author: -- ps

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I have difficulty finding the really nice colonial candles now but these were perfect. The base was large enough to fit in my candlesticks without the goo.
customer_reviews.author: Karen U. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous dripless candles
customer_reviews.text: The candles were exactly as described! So happy with it and will definitely reorder when we need more.
customer_reviews.author: ellen williams

customer_reviews.title: Best taper candles to buy
customer_reviews.text: They are the perfect tapers! They burn perfectly and do not drip. Best candles.
customer_reviews.author: jill Degan

customer_reviews.title: no smoke and no drip
customer_reviews.text: pretty color for Christmas. nice smooth surface and long burning without smoke.
customer_reviews.author: simple shopper

customer_reviews.title: They looked so nice at Christmas and I will leave them in for ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought a box of these candles to go in my collection of brass candle holders. They looked so nice at Christmas and I will leave them in for the whole year. They are beautiful candles and just as described. They have the clasic look that I like.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Newman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful candles
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly subdued red candles residing in a three-candle candelabra, not only looks great but if there's ever another blackout, I'm more than ready.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: The candles I received are not made as they used ...
customer_reviews.text: The candles I received are not made as they used to be. They melt really quickly and drip everywhere. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I returned the candles as I expected them to be more of burgundy color instead of just red.
customer_reviews.author: FP

customer_reviews.title: Best candles out there--worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: These candles are truly dripless. Not one was broken. The color is throughout the candle--not just the outside coating. They burn without smoking and last better than most candles. I have used Colonial Candles for decades and have never been disappointed with them.
customer_reviews.author: Lois S.

customer_reviews.title: Not real colonial candles
customer_reviews.text: pretty sure these were fake, they dripped everywhere and made such a mess we blew them out and threw them out. all 3 boxes did the same thing, both red and ivory. replaced them with new ones from colonial and those were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah, Kvamme Home Essentials

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CANDLES!
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the best holiday candles I have bought. They fit the antique candle sticks perfectly. Perfect wine colour for the holidays and they burn clean and long. Carefully packed. Quickly shipped.
customer_reviews.author: Olivier Dunrea

customer_reviews.title: Well made good price
customer_reviews.text: Really nice but the cranberry appears to be more red than cranberry Good price bits evenly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Cadillac of Candles
customer_reviews.text: I have used this brand for years. They burn well, are an elegant color, no annoying scent.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Ryberg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent candles
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent, clean burning candles that fit my antique candlestick, a real challenge in this day and age.
customer_reviews.author: Skeezix

customer_reviews.title: Superb Candles
customer_reviews.text: The gift shop where I've bought these candles for years has closed so I went to Amazon and ordered what I needed for the holidays. They arrived in the usual two days and all is well. Great product, good service and my home looked as festive as ever.
customer_reviews.author: lois williams

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Color
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color of candles; perfect for fall and Christmas. A quality candle with the color thru the candle not just on the outside. Slow burning. Have bought Colonial candles for at least forty years.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Candles for the Holidays
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying Colonial Candles for more years than I can remember. I can't find them locally anymore (the store closed), so I ordered them online. The cranberry color was lovely in the dining room during the holidays, but they come in a huge assortment of colors (I also bought ivory). Classic candles -- and consistently high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Fancy Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Even at this price, excellent value for money
customer_reviews.text: Candles arrived. These are not cheap, but good value as they burn very slowly and steadily.
customer_reviews.author: history buff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: You will love these candles. I got mine today and I just love them :)
customer_reviews.author: Lorena  Cremeans

customer_reviews.title: Colonial Candles are the only candles I use. They ...
customer_reviews.text: Colonial Candles are the only candles I use. They burn for 4+ hours which gets me through a party. Sometimes they drip but are usually mess free.
customer_reviews.author: Dev

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, but man damaged in shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Candles looked great, but almost half were broken in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Knut

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color, and they last for many hours. I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: love to read

customer_reviews.title: Got wrong color!
customer_reviews.text: I got the wrong color I ordered cranberry, and I got dark blue. Now I'm stuck with something I'm not happy with.
customer_reviews.author: Mejia

customer_reviews.title: Great Candles
customer_reviews.text: I love Colonial Candles. They are neatly and safely packed and they fit nicely in all of my candle holders. No wobbling!
customer_reviews.author: PR

customer_reviews.title: Dripless candles drip
customer_reviews.text: We have used Colonial Candles for years - but these were the first to drip. Not good. They made a mess
customer_reviews.author: Robert Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Candles
customer_reviews.text: Used in my living room where our organ is located. I tease my husband this is his Liberace candelabra. Need to pain wall but looks nice next to my antique mirror. The bottoms needed some help with scotch tape because my old holder were too large. I have not burned them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend !  Best stick candles on the market
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying Colonial candles for years from a local store. When the store closed i tried other brands but was always disappointed with them. They didn't last otr the color was not right or all the way through. Colonial candles last a long time ,have deep beautiful colors and don't drip. My only disappointment was that one was broken upon delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Pattie Trigueros

customer_reviews.title: Quality.
customer_reviews.text: I have repurchased these candles several times. They are well packaged for shipping, have a decent burn time and are truly dripless.
customer_reviews.author: Edith Menchyk

customer_reviews.title: Quality Dripless Tapers
customer_reviews.text: Burns clean and dripless as promised, high quality candles, you can really tell the difference
customer_reviews.author: Roxanna C

product_meta.title: Colonial Candle Classic Unscented Dripless Taper Candle, Premium Wax with Cotton Wick, Cranberry, 10 in, Pack of 12
product_meta.description: Traditional Cranberry coordinates with Holiday Sparkle scented candles. This is an unscented or fragrance free candle to be used for an elegant dining experience or for a perfect decorating and entertaining accompaniment. Our taper candles ensure a smooth, clean-burning, virtually dripless candle that burns slowly and evenly. Burn time is approximately 7 to 9 hours. Never leave burning candles unattended and always trim wicks to 1/4" prior to lighting. Box of 12 candles.
feature_bullets: These classic tapered candles are a wonderful addition to any decor and for any occasion
Unscented candles with absolutely no fragrance and a solid color all the way through for a timeless look
The base of the taper will fit perfectly with any standard size candle holder and will stand out during classy dinner parties
Made of the highest quality paraffin wax with 100 percent lead-free natural cotton fiber wicks

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars51 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
